PrefaceÂ¶

Welcome to PyQG documentation! PyQG is a project that is in its birth. It aims to build a “git generation” community quasi-geostrophic model in Python, an easy-to-use, unit-test, tool for research and teaching.

Please note the following about this project:

  • PyQG is in its birth, and its a side-project of its core

    developers.
